name: Carlo Little
description: '''Carl O'Neil Little''' (17 December 1938 â€“ 6 August 2005), better known by his stage name '''Carlo Little''', was a [[rock and roll]] [[drummer]], based in the London [[nightclub]] scene in the 1960s. He played in an early version of [[the Rolling Stones]]. Little was also with [[Cyril Davies]]' [[All-Stars (band)|All-Stars]] and was a founder member of [[Screaming Lord Sutch]]'s [[Screaming Lord Sutch & The Savages|Savages]].
